definition: any of several breeds of very small dogs kept purely as pets, engage in an activity as if it were a game rather than take it seriously
details:
noun
- any of several breeds of very small dogs kept purely as pets
= synonyms: toy dog
- a copy that reproduces a person or thing in greatly reduced size
= synonyms: miniature
- an artifact designed to be played with
= synonyms: plaything
- a device regarded as providing amusement
= example: a device regarded as providing amusement
- a nonfunctional replica of something else
= example: a nonfunctional replica of something else
verb
- engage in an activity as if it were a game rather than take it seriously
= synonyms: play
- manipulate manually or in one's mind or imagination
= synonyms: play
- behave carelessly or indifferently
= synonyms: play
